### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines

- [ ] Linting passes (`flake8 src/` and `black src/ --check`)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have updated `requirements.txt` if new dependencies were added
- [ ] I have not introduced dependencies with incompatible licenses
